SUB_W18_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Jinks, we emerged from a manhole!
I do hope they don't mistake me for
a machine from the local waterworks.

SUB_W18_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W18_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This is Capitol City, the central hub of
the Union States. Perhaps interesting
events will be unfolding here!

SUB_W18_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The amount of energy consumption in this
city is substantial; my sensors are picking
up so many readings that detailed analyses
will prove proper difficult.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
What's happening? I was just in
Capitol City a moment ago.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text: Emergency! I must fight them off!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
No further enemy signals detected,
and we've returned to the elevator.
What just happened there?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
I thought my eyes were playing tricks,
but you definitely are a robot. I guess
someone's operating you remotely?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text: Nae, I'm not operated by anyone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
And you can carry a conversation!
That's amazing. Look, I saw what happened: you got on the
elevator, this place got real weird, then
strange creatures made a beeline for you—
which means you're what they were after.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
But you seemed plenty used to that weird
place and those creatures, so how about
you tell me what just went down here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, the fiends were nothing so special—
but my sensors are now telling me that
ye are the one I should follow.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
So I've got a robot admirer now?
Well, suppose I might as well take
advantage of this little meet-cute.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
That said, I don't really want to have this
conversation in an elevator, so let's continue
it at my workplace. It's right up ahead.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_TO_CATHEDRAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_TO_CATHEDRAL_000_CUT_0.text:
This manhole may connect
to the world beyond.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, great. This is a much better place to
talk than an elevator—which again, seriously,
who wants to hang out in an elevator? Right then! Intros. I'm Shungiku Hanabusa,
ace reporter for the Capitol City Post,
among other places. Oh, but I wasn't born
here in the Union States.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
So there are other nations besides
the Union States in this world?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Your circuits seem to be missing some pretty
critical facts. That said, you're able to speak
fluently and your movements are super smooth.
Are you a prototype or something?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
The contents of my database are lacking,
and thus is my knowledge of this world.
I apologize for any trouble.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Don't apologize—just answer my questions.
To start with, what's your name?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
I am D05-72314, commonly referred
to as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Whoa, then you really ARE a robot!
Still, Diva's an interesting name for...
Well, whatever you are.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Aye, I suppose. I don't know why I'm
called that, but that knowledge is one
of the reasons I'm searching for my heart.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Looks like I judged you based on your
appearance, so sorry about that. You definitely seem to have some concerns
of your own, so if they're things I can
help with, I'd be glad to do so.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, that would be grand! The results of my
probability scans show that working together
would be to our mutual advantage, so let's
do just that, Ms. Hanabusa!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Ha ha ha! Oh man, it's been a LONG time
since someone called me 'Ms. Hanabusa.'
Howzabout you just call me Lita, eh?
That's what everyone here does.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, look at the time!
The evening news is about to start. Sorry to interrupt our chat so I can
watch the tube, but us journalists
need to keep tabs on what's going on.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Mind if I join ye, love? I'd very much like
to access more data about this world.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
The incident with the elevator made it to
the news, but they don't know the cause.
Were the security cameras not active?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Whatever happened there isn't going to
show up on a security cam. People can go
to that other place, but stuff like cameras
always stay on this side. Also, the entire thing happened in an
instant, so the cameras wouldn't have
caught us going there, either.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
But we don't need the news, because I already
know who's behind all this. Are you ready?
Are you reeeally ready? Okay, here we go...
It was...aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Aliens: intelligent life-forms that come
from beyond the current world.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
I'm super relieved you took that in stride;
most people think I'm joking or crazy when
I talk about aliens, and I end up being
laughed out of the room. But here's the thing: no one knows why the
aliens are here, which is why I've launched
a secret investigation to find out.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Are these aliens related to your
presidential election, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
That's my biggest fear; if aliens were
to interfere in the election, it would
essentially overthrow our democracy
at its very foundations!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
So far, it doesn't seem like they've been
trying to influence the election. But we're
entering the final stages now, so if they're
going to make a move, this is the time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Now then! Judging from—well, whatever you've
got going on there—you don't have a home base,
so you're welcome to crash here at my work for
a bit while you get that sorted out. Meanwhile, I'm going to head home.
I actually live on this floor—can't
beat a commute like that!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
These aliens may have something to do with
my heart—but on the other hand, I myself
am an alien from Lita's perspective. Perhaps I could learn something if I
managed to find a real alien, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Good morning. You feeling refreshed?
Or wait, do you not sleep since you're
a mech and all?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Aye, I have a sleep function, but it
just reduces my power consumption.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Okay, well, if you just start wandering the
streets someone's likely to dump you in a
garbage truck, so I'll let you use this place
while you're here in Capitol City.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Oh, hey! It's time for
the morning news.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
I hear there's lots of money changing hands
right now. And yeah, the owner of that new
commercial building is a hotshot businessman,
but it's still a bit shady.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Oh, that reminds me! I heard from a friend at
the National Research Institute this morning,
and he really wants to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Yeah, I told my friend about it—but no details,
I promise! He doesn't know where you're from,
what you're here for, or anything like that.
You'll be fine talking to him, I promise. Hey, I'm a reporter, remember?
I protect my sources.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Still, I won't force you to meet up with him,
so if you'd rather go somewhere else first,
that's fine. I'll just be tagging along behind
you wherever you go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Well, duh! I can't very well ignore a juicy
story like 'Lost Robot in Search of a Heart,'
even if the idea of finding your heart in
Capitol City IS a complete fairy tale.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text: Does this world not have hearts, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Er, sorry. Figure of speech. But hey,
on another matter, how much money
do you have on you right now?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Eh, mechs don't need to eat anyway,
so I guess it's fine. Now let's go to work!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, you made it! Good, good. Excellent.
I'm Dr. Nishant, a researcher here at
the NRI. Please, come in, come in!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
And it's all right for us to see inside
your National Research Institute?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, this area is open to all; it's just
a minor research space for my hobby. My actual laboratory is located elsewhere in
the facility—and of course, non-personnel
aren't allowed in there.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text: Hee hee! Your 'hobby.' I love it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Aaand here we are! My hobby research space.
This little piece of equipment right here
is actually why I wanted to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
I call it the 'Anti-Alien Battle Simulator'—
or A.B.S., for short. Tough name, right? Yes, well, as the name would indicate,
it's a simulator where you fight aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
And seeing as you have already repelled
some aliens, Diva, I would very much
like you to evaluate the device.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
A battle in virtual space? Aye, I see.
If I'm able to help, I'll be happy to.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
This IS the first time I've had a
live test subject in my simulator,
but I assure you it's perfectly safe.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text: Would you like to join me, Lita?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text: Right then! If you would be so kind?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Fascinating! Having a living being inside
the simulator has produced a series of
entirely different results! If I can tweak the A.B.S. based on this data,
our results should improve dramatically!
I must get started at once...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
My connection to the virtual space was stable,
and felt like a real battle. However, it seems
the strength of my foes was set far lower than
that of the true aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text: I intended them to be weak! The simulation was based on reports of past incidents, as well as observations of the spatial distortions that occurred when other victims became involved.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Why, if I made them any stronger, we'd have
no hope of victory! ...Which I'm just now
realizing is such a difficult fact to accept
that it likely influenced my research. Damn you, blind-trial system! I am unworthy
to call myself a scientist! The whole purpose
of this is to find a means to oppose the aliens,
and I've gone and ruined it all!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Don't worry, love! I'll provide you with
my own data so you can set your own
difficulty however you like.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Sweet! I was hoping you'd say that.
Anyway, good luck with the continued
research on your hobby, Dr. Nishant.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Yes, yes, thank you—although I fear I've
been neglecting my actual work too much,
which the Institute will NOT be happy about. Well, I'll just have to do the best I can
on this in whatever spare time I have.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Feel free to use the simulator anytime,
Diva. I've already had an entry card
made for you, so you can access this part
of the lab even when I'm not here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Just don't spend all of your time on
this glorified arcade machine, or my
article is going to be VERY dull.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Aye, and it also won't help me
learn where my heart is.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Whoa, what a commotion! There must
be some kind of incident going on!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text: Hey there, John. What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Always quick to sniff out a
new story, aren't you, Lita? Well, turns out the crystal on display at
the Capitol has been stolen—and according to
eyewitness reports, the culprit JUMPED from
the Upper Layer down to the General! Crazy, right? Anyway, I'm trying
to dig up more evidence now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Sounds like something a video game
character would do. You really think
this witness of yours is reliable?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm not at liberty to divulge details
of the investigation. That said,
let me know if you turn up anything
that might pertain to the case.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Ye cooperate with the police
despite being a reporter?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Any citizen should cooperate with the police.
That said, as an information source, they tend
to be a one-way street for reporters, so I'm
certainly not going to tell them anything.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
The culprit must have considerable physical
capabilities to be able to snatch up the
crystal and jump from the Upper Layer.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
That guy looks plenty suspicious.
Might be the culprit.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Suspicion is an inherently human feeling—
perhaps ye might even call it intuition?
I cannae really comment on it, but I'd
believe ye if that's what ye said.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Beg pardon, but are ye the one who
stole the crystal from the Capitol?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: I knew it! He's an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: We got him! I gotta call John.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Caught the thief yourself, eh, Lita?
Impressive. I'll make sure you get an
official commendation from the force.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Don't. It'll just make gathering
info for stories that much harder.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Sure, sure, I getcha. We'll just say
a 'local citizen' cooperated in the
apprehension of the suspect.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
I suppose this means the mystery
of the aliens is solved.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
I wouldn't count on it. The police aren't going
to find anything—they never do. This will just
be reported as your run-of-the-mill theft with
some criminal out to make a quick buck.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
But the crystal does not appear to
be anything particularly grand.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
It's grand enough—and valuable enough—for
a glittery thing that decorates the Capitol.
However, there have long been rumors about
it not being your ordinary hunk of rock.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
What do ye think the aliens were trying
to accomplish in stealing it, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Not a clue. But we've thrown a wrench
in the works, which should help
lead us to the next step.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
You'll see—and it's all
thanks to you, Diva!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Well, I think it's about
time to call it a day.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
...Hmm? Oh, wait a minute.
I've got a message.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
'Secret meeting tonight between an
Allen supporter and one other individual.
Location: Grand Capitol Hotel lounge.'

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
That sounds like what we heard on the news
this morning. I calculate a 98 percent chance
this individual will be the owner of the new
commercial facility.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Could be—and it'd be one heck of a scoop
to catch someone in the act! That said,
this could also be an intentional leak
by someone with other plans.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Right? No self-respecting journalist
would let a scoop like this get away.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Yeah, I don't feel like risking my
credibility as a journalist on something
this flimsy. Let's just head home.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Look! That's the bigshot owner of that new
commercial facility. And like the tip said,
he's with one of Allen's supporters—
a local politician of some renown.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text: Oh, it's a big scoop. Wining and dining someone at a place like this stinks like week-old fish. Still, the candidate was smart enough to use a middleman, which blunts the impact.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
But the fact a political mover and shaker
like this is meeting with the owner gives
me all the dirt I need for a major story.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Now c'mon. Let's head back so I can
get this thing written. Heh heh heh...

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
I'm glad ye seem to 
be enjoying yourself.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Good work today! Now let's
check out the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_000.text:
So that's how things are looking at the moment.
But they report on each candidate's approval
ratings every day, so this could totally swing
the other direction by tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_010.text:
If they look at approval ratings, the candidates
and their supporters can change their course of
action, making such ratings important data that
can affect the election's outcome.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_020.text:
See? You get it. Anyways, let's call
it a night. I'll see you tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning, sunshine!
Now quick, turn on the news!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Yesterday's secret meeting is already
on the news. Did ye give them the
information ye had, Lita?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_010.text:
I sure did. This could be a huge story,
so I have to strike while the iron's hot.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_000.text:
A sudden cut on their body at night?
Oh, but that's disturbing. Is there
no other information on the incidents?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_010.text: Well, the news didn't mention that the people being attacked all have lots of social influence.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_020.text:
It's also happening to people who tend to
work alone—internet celebrities and that
sort of thing—rather than politicians or
businesspeople who are always with others.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_030.text:
Also, none of the victims have any idea who
could have attacked them. This stinks to
high heaven of aliens. Aliens, I tell you!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_040.text:
Is that so? I wouldn't think such a
determination could be made based on
the information we currently have.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_050.text:
Well, it's fine: we're working together,
so I don't think I have to worry about being
attacked. Now c'mon—you've got places
you want to go, and I'm going with you!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_060.text: Aye, let's keep searching for my heart!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_000.text:
Are you interested in the debate they
mentioned on the news? I could use my
press pass to get in if you want.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_010.text:
I wouldn't call it 'interest,' exactly,
but I do think I should participate in
order to gain more data about this world.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_020.text:
Right, well, I don't HAVE to go to,
so I'll leave it up to you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_030.text:
And sure, it'll be packed with reporters
and broadcast across Capitol City, but
I bet you'll see some things in person
that you'd miss otherwise.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_040.text:
News reports aren't everything, you know.
Sometimes you have to just get out there,
grab life by the lapels, and shake it
until you see what falls out!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_050.text:
Ye think the information stored in
my database may not be able to
account for all things, then?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_060.text:
See? You get it. So if you want to see the
debate, I'll just say you're my assistant. ...We're going, right?
Say we're going!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I know I'm sort of dragging you into my work
here, so lemme give you the lowdown. Basically,
debates are a venue in which participants share
their opinions on topics determined in advance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Hmm. Strange. The moderator generally keeps
things moving, but this one is coming off a
little weird. It's almost like he's backing
James Allen on everything he says...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Could he be a supporter
of Mr. Allen, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
It's possible—but as a professional moderator,
it would be a massive breach of ethics.
I just can't imagine him doing that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.text: Which candidate do ye like, love?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I support a candidate
named Nunya Beezwax! Anyway, this is as far from a fair exchange
of ideas as you can get. I'm glad I got to see
this in person; we might not have noticed his
subtle bias if we weren't sitting here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Hello, love. I'd like to use
the simulator if I could.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, Diva! Welcome, welcome.
Now then, what level would you
like the simulation set to?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Oh, just pick one for me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Let's gather more data on enemies we can beat.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Let's make a guess at the capabilities of a normal alien.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_010.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_010.text:
Oh, but this data is WONDERFUL!
Please do come back soon.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
I briefly considered having you stay here,
but then I thought better of it. It's a place
for VIPs, which means it's super pricy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
A simple room is more than enough for me.
Oh, but not to imply the space you have me
in is simple! Far from it! Oh gosh, I'm sorry.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ha ha! No worries. Still, if you weren't
a robot, I would've wanted to take you
out for a fancy dinner at least once.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Question, love: is that tree in
the center of the lobby real?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
It sure is—although it used to be outside.
See, it was here when the hotel was built
over a hundred years ago, and the man who
founded this place really loved it. Some time ago, a redevelopment plan was
launched for Capitol City that involved
cutting it down, but the hotel fought it
tooth and nail.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Eventually, they reached an agreement where
the redevelopment plan paid for the tree to
be replanted inside the hotel. As the hotel tells it, there were concerns
the tree might immediately wither and die,
but it perked right back to life because
the founder's soul lives on inside it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Anyway, enough of that! I didn't get any
tips that require me to be here today,
so how about we get going?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Hey, sorry, but I just got contacted by
a friend. Mind if we head somewhere?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Apparently there was a spatial distortion
sighted in a particular section of the
General Layer, and I'm thinking it might
be connected to the aliens. Wanna go?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Guess that means I should reconsider.
We'll just head home instead.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
According to my source, this is the place
where the spatial distortion was seen.
...Huh? What in the—

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
A fiend attempted to pull ye into
another dimension, so I crossed over
and gave it a proper thrashing.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
Oh my gosh, this explains the people who
are being cut! Since they're being hurt
in a different dimension, it seems to
be happening instantaneously!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
We might have been lured out, but thanks to you,
we were able to turn the tables on the culprit.
Case closed, and no one is the wiser! Now let's
get back so I can fill my friend in on all this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Good work today.
And now, it's news time!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_000.text:
So that's what we're looking at today.
Those two men are vying for the presidency,
and the news is giving us a good idea
of what each one stands for.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Seems a head-scratcher
of a decision to me.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Oh, you don't know the half of it.
The current president has done a lot,
so there's a heavy responsibility
waiting for whoever takes over. Do we develop the Union States further,
or do we seek stability instead?
It's going to be a tough choice.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_040.text:
I may be able to acquire data I cannae
otherwise get in this election period.
When Lita wakes, we should travel
the city and see what things are like.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning! Man, I slept like a ROCK.
Now then, I wonder what fascinating
mysteries might await us today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_000.text:
So she's finally making her
major label debut, eh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_020.text:
She's massively talented. Like they said
on the news, she was huge even before
the label decided to sign her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_030.text:
Entertainment news is outside my wheelhouse,
so I totally forgot today was her big album
launch. But, uh, we can go check it out if
you're curious about her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_040.text:
It's like ye know about all of this even
if ye don't. How curious! Still, I might
learn something if we speak to her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_050.text:
You think you'll be able to remember
something? Well then, let's get going!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_000.text:
So she's finally making her
major label debut, eh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_010.text:
Is this new singer
someone ye know?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_020.text:
Not personally, but she was huge
long before the label signed her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_030.text:
And while I'm curious about her debut, I'm even
more curious about public sentiment around the
election—and there's no way to do that other than
picking the brains of Joe and Jane Lunchpail!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Whoa, there's already a ton of people here!
Guess I shouldn't be surprised, seeing as
she's giving a free concert.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, we won't get anywhere near the stage
at this rate. But if you like her music, I'll let
you listen to everything I've downloaded
when we get back to the office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_SINGER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_SINGER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
That's a shame; I'd hoped
to see her performance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Huh? What are you two doing here?
You really should leave.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Did something happen? Biohazard breach!?
Radiation leak!? Dimensional tear!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Oh, some of our alternative-energy equipment
has spiraled out of control and is now in
danger of exploding. Nothing major.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Ye were doing such research in the middle
of the city!? That's mad! What happens
if the citizens get caught up in it!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
It's small-scale equipment that's contained
behind a three-stage barrier—so even if there
IS an explosion, the laboratory isn't at risk. We just want people to evacuate
out of an abundance of caution.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Okay, but that still doesn't explain why
you're running an out-of-control energy
experiment in the middle of the city.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Well, everything was simply peachy through
yesterday—but when I increased the output
for today's test, we suddenly lost control. Before I fled the lab, I saw a strange device
attached to the control unit. I think it's
the cause of all this, but I don't know what
it is, much less how to stop it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
Smells like sabotage to me.
You think it's the aliens?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_09.text: What sort of device was it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
It has an array of triangles on it,
but I didn't exactly have time to
investigate it carefully.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
I'm familiar with certain triangles,
and may be able get this sorted.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_00.text:
It's dangerous here, love.
Please wait outside.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_01.text:
I'm not going to stand around
and miss the scoop of the century,
thank you very much!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_02.text: Er, actually, everything you see here is highly, highly classified, so you can't write about any of this unless you want a scary visit from some very large men.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_04.text:
I put my chance of success at 50 percent.
Ye must get away; the danger is too great.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_05.text: But I... Oh, fine. All right.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_06.text: Right then. Time to get on.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Control has been restored!
The levels are dropping!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_02.text:
You did it! Hooray for you!
Also, now I can write my article.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Did you not hear what I said earlier?
Confidential! Secrets! Very large men!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_04.text:
Which is all the more reason I HAVE to write it.
This is clearly part of an alien attack, which means
they know the National Research Institute is part
of our anti-alien efforts!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_05.text:
And if you're right and they can attack us
like this whenever they please, we have no
real way to fight back! Please, Lita. Most of my colleagues at the
Institute have nothing to do with aliens.
I can't drag them into this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_07.text:
Yes, well, I have to clean up this
incid... Er, this 'unusual situation.'
I will see you both some other time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELEMENT_000_CUT_030_00.text:
Logic circuits overheating.
Engaging cooling system.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
My news magazine is based in this office
building, along with a number of other
businesses. Oh, and it also has this
delightful little cafe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Are you nuts!? Allen is CLEARLY the right
choice! What's Bailey ever done, huh?
Nothing! A big stinking pile of nothing!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Capitol City's economy is amazing right now
because of Allen. And if he wins, things are
only going to get better!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, but I just don't agree. Sure, Allen is
proactive with business, science, and tech—
and yes, we'll likely be a stronger country if he
wins—but he's just too much of a hard-liner.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
But with Bailey, you get someone who's steady
and even-keeled. You get a sense of stability,
which is just as important as growth.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, well. Looks like some of my neighbors
are engaged in a heated political debate.
You get this a lot during election season.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there!
What do YOU think about all this!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Easy, Violetta! You can't just grill
people about their personal beliefs.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, I don't mind—besides which, I very much
want to hear what my new companion thinks.
So come on, Diva! Out with it!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Why is everyone asking ME!?
I've no right to vote, so my answer
means nothing one way or the other...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, fine. Then who do you think
is going to WIN the election!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Right!? RIGHT!? You gotta go with the
tried-and-tested record of success!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
An excellent choice. A president should
bring a sense of stability to the job,
instead of flash and trickery.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
And there you have it, Diva!
Your first political debate!
Did you enjoy it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
If that was meant to be fun,
I'm afraid I dinnae get it.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
Hmm... That woman looks rather
out of place for the Institute.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh yeah, my journalist senses are
kicking in hard. Let's follow her!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
I guess cracking that code earlier
wore you down, huh? All right, sure.
We can head back.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey, you just came out of the NRI, right?
Cutting a pretty weird path through the
city, don't you think? What's your deal?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Could the abnormalities in the
experimental device be the work
of the aliens, then?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Doctor Nishant really picked a
terrible time to lose his nerve.
What the hell are we supposed to—

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Hold it. You two were the ones lurking
around during the incident at the
National Research Institute today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
I'm Bonnie Blair, and this little
rascal here's Formina Franklyn. We're with the Capitol City Police Department, but
we're currently on loan to the Office of the President—
so you two cowpokes can just think of this as a
friendly little chat with the president's office!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
We've already spoken to the director of the
Institute—one Doctor Nishant—so please
hold nothing back during our questioning.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
If you already talked to him, we've got
nothing to add. The two of us don't know
anything about what goes on in the NRI.
We just happened to be there, is all.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
And the creatures you call 'aliens'?
What about them?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Hey, you're the ones working for the president,
so maybe stop asking me these inane questions
and go DO SOMETHING ABOUT THEM before this
all explodes into a serious incident!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
The Office of the President is well aware of
the situation—and while it won't get any public
attention, I can assure you the NRI has been
directed to continue its activities as before.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Also, y'all didn't ask for my opinion,
but I don't believe in aliens or UFOs
or any of that. All a buncha horse plop,
if ya don't mind my sayin' so.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Then I guess there's nothing
more for us to discuss.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text: That mech was the one, right?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
It sure was—but let's
leave it be for now.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text:
Yes, I'm fine. Just surprised, is all.
But why was she in such a hurry?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, I was getting some weird vibes
from her, too. C'mon, she went this way!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey there. You bumped into me earlier—
which is totally fine, these things happen.
We were just concerned that something
might be wrong. Why the big hurry?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Can't believe we bumped into an alien
right here in the city. I swear I'm a
magnet for this kind of stuff...

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Goodness gracious! I detected a distortion
in space-time and came here to investigate,
and what should I find but the pair of you! So, er, was there an alien here?
Did I miss it?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, but we handled it. That said,
I'm actually surprised you came out
of your lab to see it in person.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
I suspect the alien you tangled with is the
one responsible for the incident at the NRI.
I couldn't risk it coming into contact with any
of the other researchers, so I came straightaway.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Wait, did something happen
at the lab!? Are you okay!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I'm quite well, thank you.
Our three-stage barrier managed
to prevent a large-scale explosion.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
I detected a momentary increase in energy
levels earlier; that was clearly the cause.
What manner of incident was it?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, this is all off the record, but the
National Research Institute is currently
researching alternative energy—and it's a
very challenging thing to keep under control! But this morning, someone attached a device
to the control system that caused a good deal
of interference—hence the exploding and the
booms and whatnot.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
I calculate a 65 percent probability
the alien we encountered earlier
is responsible for this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Meaning the alien wanted your research
to fail, and was willing to go to any
lengths to make it happen. I'm just glad the lab's barrier prevented
an even greater catastrophe here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
We were able to drive the culprit
away thanks to ye, Lita.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, seeing as the two of you have dealt with
the culprit, I should head back to the NRI and
get started on the repair work. Oh, and my little
laboratory is safe too, so don't worry about that.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Are there other members of the anti-alien
group besides Dr. Nishant and yourself?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm in contact with about ten people,
but for the safety of the organization,
no one knows everyone's identity.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Does that not make your operations
terrifically inefficient, though?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I mean, sure, but you can't ever be too
careful when you're working in a big city. But there are also some relationships you can
only build when you don't know people, and the
unknown factor you get with lots of strangers
living together is what makes a city great.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_040.text: Anyways, let's see what's on the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Three days to go until the election,
and the aliens are busier than ever.
This is honestly exhausting.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Yet your vitals are stable, love;
ye're healthy as anything!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_020.text:
That's 'cause being a reporter is
a test of stamina. Anyways, g'night.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning. I don't imagine there's going to be
anything big going down today, but we should
check the news anyway.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_000.text:
Looks like I was right and the candidates
aren't planning any big moves—which is my
chance to go track down a huge scoop in
the form of a personal-interest story!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_020.text:
Oh, finding a story about someone's private
life is the scoopiest of scoops.
Now let's get out into the world and
track down something interesting!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_030.text: Aye, let's look for my heart.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So many cats! Do they all
belong to you, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, heavens no! I'm just taking care of
them. These kitties belong to everyone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Stray cats tend to gather in this particular
corner of the Inspectorate, and Jessica here
is always kind enough to take care of them.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, there's no need for praise, dearie; I love taking care of my special kittens! Honestly, even though I'm on the staff here, I sometimes feel like taking care of them is my real job.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.text: Hey, look over there. Is that...?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Goodness, there's clearly no escaping
the watchful eye of a talented reporter! But yes, dear, that's Noah Bailey, the
presidential candidate. He's helping to
clean up this area—and doing so on the
'down-low,' as the children like to say.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Even though he's a very important politician,
he's always wandering around town picking up
trash and cleaning graffiti. Oh, but please
don't put any of this in a story!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
If the whole world learned he was doing this,
he couldn't stay on the down-low—and that
means the trash wouldn't get cleaned anymore!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Well, this is a real dilemma. My journalistic
senses are screaming for me to turn this into
a story, but I also understand what Jessica
is saying about it ruining Bailey's good work.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
I cannae think of any reason
why ye should not.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_050.text:
That is so adorably innocent, I want to
hug you until your stuffing falls out. Still, I love it—and since I don't know for
sure which option would help Bailey more,
I'll just write the best story I can.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
You're right. Bailey genuinely seems to
be doing a good thing here, and turning
that into a scoop for my own personal
gain feels pretty skeezy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_CATS_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Aye, and Jessica did ask ye
not to write it as well.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, now we're in the other dimension!?
This must mean...

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
It's just like that first time in the
elevator. Be careful, love; though we
cannae see them, I detect enemies nearby.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Then you have already named everyone
in this place as your enemy?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
They've shown themselves.
Moving to attack!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Tsk! So belligerent. Did it ever occur to you to
approach a problem with dialogue instead of
simply running straight at it? I come bearing
useful information, if you will but listen.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
You are on a journey in search of your heart?
Well, the item you seek is not to be found in
Capitol City, so you should move on to your
next destination right away.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Truly? My heart isn't here?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: I believe ye.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Nae, it's all lies.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm pleased you were willing to parley,
and leave the rest to you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: I've no proof your words are true.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I speak for your sake: there is no
need to waste time searching here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: All right, I believe ye.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Nae, still lies.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
A pity it had to come to this.
Ah, well. Death it is, then.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: My heart is not here...

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
He didn't seem much like an alien,
but then again, who knows?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
If my heart cannot be found here,
there's no point in remaining.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, so you're just going
to abandon me!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Thanks for everything, Lita.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I know I was making a lot of assumptions
and presuming upon you, but you're just
so dang strong! Can't blame a girl for
dreaming, am I right?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Apologies, but I don't understand
such things. Ta now, love!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
What was going on with that person, then?
These aliens must be truly pressed to
approach me with such a proposal.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
You said your goal was to find your heart, right?
Wouldn't that have been easier if you just went
along with what he was suggesting?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: I don't know. Let's go.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Are you angry about the first incident?
That was merely a test of your strength!
I thought you realized as much.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
We are the same as you: we have each
come to this world with an objective. We do not wish to interfere with your goal,
nor do we want you to interfere with ours.
I seek only to know what your objective is.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I don't know how you think you will obtain such
a thing, but at least I know your purpose now.
However, if such is your objective, I would ask
you to pursue only this, and nothing more.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
There's no need for me to divulge
such information. We hope only that
you achieve your goal in short order.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Was that an alien? What happened?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I believe they want to warn me off doing
anything that would get in the way of their
own goals. I imagine they're going to be
some trouble for you as well, love.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
As a reporter, I welcome all the trouble I can
handle—but as a member of the anti-alien
organization, I'd rather not provoke them until
we have a better idea what we're dealing with.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
I hear someone sent a tip to the
police from the Metropolitan Building.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
Your skills are wide-ranging if you're
also able to intercept communications!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
Yeah, I guess I am pretty great.
Now let's go check it out!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text: Heck yeah, let's get that scoop!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
The building alarms inside are going off,
but it doesn't look like the police have
arrived quite yet.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
We're the first ones here.
What's happening inside?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
I had my camera ready in case something
like this happened. Also, it looks like the
cops just showed.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Aw, hell. Lita? How'd you get here
before we did—or were you actually
the one who tipped us off?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
We happened to be passing by when we heard the
alarm—and when I heard breaking glass, I started
taking photos. There could be something useful
there, so feel free to take a look.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Appreciate it. Now let's see what we've got...
Hold the damn phone! Forget 'something useful,'
you've got shots of the window moments after it
broke. Almost feels too good to be true.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
If you have any suspicions, you know how to
find me. Oh, and while I'm happy to testify 
to whatever you need, right now I'm out.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
The alarm that went off was located in
Allen's campaign office. This whole thing
stinks to high heaven if you ask me!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
It seems you've no need of the data I
recorded during the incident, then.
Oh, but you're always so impressive!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Yeah, I guess so. Still, it feels like
someone may have set this up to
happen when I was here. Guess we'll
find out for sure tomorrow, huh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Question, love: There's an elevator to
the upper layer we've not used, aye?
What's up there, exactly?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, you mean the one between the Capitol
and the Inspectorate? Yeah, they don't
let normal folks access that.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It connects right to the president's office,
so it's locked down for security purposes.
Only the president or members of his
cabinet are allowed to use it.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The backbone of your nation,
in other words.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_000.text:
An attack on a campaign office?
That's trouble right there.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_020.text:
No, never. But this election has basically
become a duel between the two candidates,
and their supporters are desperate.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_030.text:
And sure, previous elections in the Union
States always had your typical skullduggery,
but it was nothing like this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_040.text:
In any event, I'm headed back to my
place to finish some work. Good night.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_040_000.text: Morning! Let's pop the news on.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
So it was all an inside job, eh?
I guess that's one explanation.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
I cannae understand why they'd
want to hurt their own side.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
I can think of a few reasons—like wanting
to hurt the Bailey campaign, for one—but I
feel like that's not all there is to this. There may be a bigger crisis here than they're
letting on. Allen's camp has clearly put their
foot in it, but I'm not sure we should think
about things so simply.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
Ye think we've been swept up in a wee bit
of Allen's political shenanigans?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
If that's true, they're gonna
find I don't come cheap.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text:
Harassment, huh? Bailey's side will deny it
to their dying breath, but it's hardly
surprising that they're suspected—and this
is the kind of thing that can swing a vote.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text:
But the identity of the
culprit remains unknown.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text: The public doesn't care who actually did it; they're all about the scandal. That's why you always get an endless stream of this kind of thing during elections.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Anyway, time for us to get
out there and seize the day!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_000.text:
Looks like there won't be any major
election-related events today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_010.text:
That said, unexpected things are sure to
crop up—things like this office incident—
so I'm going to put the job of discovering
them into your capable hands!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_020.text:
I don't imagine they'll have anything to
do with my heart, but sharp's the word
and quick's the action!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text: Greetings, humans! I am an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, how convenient! I've been
wanting to interview an alien. So which planet do you hail from?
Or are you from another galaxy entirely?
I assume you use a flying saucer, right? Also, how do you like the food?
Oh, and are you here all alone,
or did you come in a group?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Have you ever even seen an alien before?
And I mean besides me, so don't go saying
'I'm looking at one right now.'

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I don't WANT to meet an alien—also,
your little street show here sucks,
so I'm not leaving a tip. Let's go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
In this insular little world, outsiders have
long been viewed as witches and monsters—
and now aliens as well! Ah, but how will they deal with interference
that truly comes from outside their world?
It is ever so interesting...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The coffee here is amazing, and the hotel cafe
sells the roasted beans so you can have it at
home. Let's drop in for a minute, 'kay?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The brew you drink each morning
comes from this place, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_020.text: Oh, look! Emily's in the cafe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That's the singer we saw on
the telly the other day.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Hi, there! You're Emily Bryant,
right? I'm a big fan.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I'm a reporter named Lita Caryx—oh,
and this is my assistant, Diva.
I don't really cover entertainment,
but it's still awfully nice to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Aw, that's great! It's nice to meet you guys,
too—and Diva is such a pretty name!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You seem to be alone.
Are you waiting for someone?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_100.text: Yeah, I'm meeting my agent here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_110.text:
No surprise someone as popular as you
would have a busy schedule—and how crazy
is it that you made your big debut just
before the election!? You've got a lot of guts; I would have
been worried about my album getting
lost in all the noise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Yeah, that was a risk, but I wanted to get it
out during the election so my music wouldn't
be tied to any particular president, you know? And since I can keep any spotlight on me focused
on news about the debut, I don't have to deal with
a bunch of annoying interviews from people who
want to know which of the candidates I support.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I guess that's one way
to think of it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Hee hee! Speaking of which, THIS is
starting to feel like an interview!
Guess you really are a journalist, huh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Does it!? Oh gosh, sorry about that.
I wasn't trying to do that, I swear.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Aw, it's okay. And since you're a fan,
I'm gonna go ahead and skip my usual
interview fee. Whoops! I see my agent there.
Gotta go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Thanks for talking with me,
and good luck with everything!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_180.text:
No one's ever complimented my name before—
though it does make me wonder why I'm
called Diva in the first place.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_190.text:
I always figured you were a singer or something.
Either way, how great was it to get to see a
cutie like Emily up close?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_200.text: A singer? Me? Heavens no, love.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: Well, I'll be hog-tied and tossed in a barrel! More aliens!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
We're going to have more alien sightings
than we know what to do with if we keep
trying to chase down all of these leads.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: Yeah, I reckon this is just another street performance—which don't make a lick of sense, because who in their right mind wants to see someone pretendin' to be an alien!? I swear, I had no idea bein' an investigator would be so much work.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
So the CCPD is chasing aliens now?
I had no idea...

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: We shouldn't get in their way.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
You read my mind. If this is about
aliens, we can't ignore it. C'mon!
