SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
Good point. If those two want to waste their
time chasing after a bunch of half-baked
street performers, that's their problem.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hmm. He vanished. Perhaps these aliens
are more real than we gave them credit
for initially.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text: Or we just mistook what we saw.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm Lita Caryx with the Post.
Did something happen?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, just a little spate of street performers
actin' like aliens. We ain't managed to run
any of 'em down yet, but maybe y'all have?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
We have, actually—and they weren't remotely
entertaining. Frankly, you're better off just
leaving them be...unless there's something
criminal about their activities?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Our information suggests there is
one odd 'alien' out here somewhere. Unfortunately, we can't pin down exactly
what is odd about them—just that they are.
Hence our investigation.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, the man we ran into wasn't particularly
odd, unless you count being the world's least
entertaining entertainer as odd.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
We appreciate your cooperation. Here is our
contact information. Please get in touch if
you come across anything of note.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? This says you work for the
Presidential Security Office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Aw, that's just temporary.
We're sorta on loan to 'em from
the Capitol City Police Department.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sounds like the president might be trying to
do something about the aliens. This calls
for some good old-fashioned sleuthing!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
I hope I go the rest of my life without
running into an 'alien' street performer.
Was there some kind of incident?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Our investigation is designed to prevent an
incident from occurring. We received information
about an odd 'alien' somewhere in the city—
not that I place any stock in such things.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
If you ask little ol' me, aliens and
UFOs and whatnot ain't nothin'
but a big pile'a horse plop.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Here is our contact information.
Please get in touch if you come
across anything of note.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Home sweet home!
C'mon, let's watch the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Allen's quote about the
plane is pretty odd.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_030.text:
I mean, sure, the Union States leads the world
in a lot of technological areas, but VTOL for
passenger planes is a pipe dream's pipe dream.
Hell, it'd be more magic than science.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_040.text:
Can the ground withstand it? Is everyone aware of
how difficult it would be to control? There are all
kinds of technical hurdles to overcome, and some
of those are a long way from being solved. I know Allen likes to talk
a big game, but still.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_050.text:
But would he really say something
so completely mad without at least
some evidence to back him up?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_060.text:
Yeah, maybe my instincts are wrong.
Anyways, see you tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_070.text:
Instincts... Aye, those are
something I lack.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Something's sure got your goat
by the look of it. What's up?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_010.text:
Oh, I was just thinking about the
notion of instincts and intuition—
but it's time for the telly now.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Okay, that's all good to know.
Now let's get rolling!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_010.text:
Yep. It's a valuable opportunity for candidates
to give speeches straight to their supporters.
Gathering people together in person like that
helps to build a sense of solidarity.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_020.text:
Also, some candidates go press the flesh
with their supporters after the speech,
so a lot of people come just to try and
meet someone famous.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_030.text: Like a festival, then! Sounds grand.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_040.text:
You want to check it out? They let anybody
in there, so if you're interested, just pop
on over to the venue at Metro Square.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay, this is weird. What's with the heckling?
Everyone at this rally should all be on the
same page about Bailey.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Whaddaya mean Bailey isn't here!?
You're supposed to be on top of this!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Everything is fine, sir. A car accident
has snarled traffic around the area,
but he should be arriving shortly.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_04.text:
That's because our traffic policies are
USELESS! Also, the fact he's making his
possible constituents wait is PROOF
Bailey doesn't take us seriously!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, but why is that man so steamed?
Casting blame won't solve the problem.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, if he won't speak, then I will!
In fact, I'll give a speech so good,
Bailey is SURE to win!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Okay, this is getting way out of hand.
I'm not going to be able to cover the
rally at this rate.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_000_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh, look who it is. Perfect timing.
You're coming with me!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_000_00.text:
I bet this'll be way more fun than
busting up the campaign rally.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Do you even know who I AM, you idiot!?
There are serious penalties for interfering
with the press in this country!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I know exactly who you are...
which is why you and me are gonna
go somewhere VERY far away!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_010_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_010_CUT_010_01.text:
Interfering this blatantly in a democratic
election is NOT going to fly with me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_00.text:
We're getting to the good part of the
rally now. Just listen to those cheers!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_01.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_01.text:
Hey, you're that pair from earlier.
You two all right?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_02.text:
We sure are! We talked everything out and
convinced those people to turn around
and just call it a day.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_04.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_04.text:
Did someone hire those people
to sabotage Bailey's rally?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_05.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_05.text:
I asked them about that, but they wouldn't say.
Probably for the best, since anything that came
out of their mouths would assuredly be a lie.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_06.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MEETING_040_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, the rally went off without a hitch,
so I'll stop speculating. Thanks so much
for all of your help today.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Goodness, dearie! We certainly are
seeing a lot of each other lately.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Or maybe it's just that you've been
spending more time outside.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, I suppose that's true. There's just so
much to investigate in our work that I have
to take a breather every now and again.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
In addition to watching out for the usual
election-season shenanigans, the head of the
Security Office has also been acting oddly.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Well then, it's time for me to get back
to work. Good luck out there, dearie!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Yep. Someone's definitely
stirring up trouble.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
No, I'm talking about what she said about
the head of the Presidential Security Office,
Tristan Hernandez. He's an old military buddy of
the president—they were both
heroes of the Channel War.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Being chief of the Security Office is a more
modest job than you'd think, but the president
apparently trusts Hernandez more than anyone.
And if he's behaving strangely...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text: I do like stirring up trouble...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
And perhaps the man will have
something to do with my heart!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
How are we going to look into the activities
of the head of the Presidential Security Office?
We lack even the most basic information that
would allow me to search for him with my sensors.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Oh, we've got information.
Just you wait.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Lita, I just detected a spatial
distortion near your location.
Have you been attacked again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
No, nothing's going on here.
We're totally fine.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Ah, that's a relief! Well, the distortion
was brief as usual, so I wouldn't worry.
Talk to you soon.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Hm... You know, if we're not the only ones
who can get caught up in these weird
spatial anomaly things...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Then it could have happened
to Mr. Hernandez?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
That's exactly what I think—AND I think
he was holding a secret meeting.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text: With the aliens? Oh my days...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Are the chief and the aliens connected?
Is the president aware of his activities,
or is he acting alone? Either way, this
is a major development.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
There's not enough evidence to go public,
but we've got a lead now—and I never let
a lead escape.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Another day finished up.
Let's see what's on the tube.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Things sure have been eventful in the
lead-up to the election, huh? I haven't
had a moment's rest since you got here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Oh, but don't get me wrong—I'm not griping.
Always better to be busy than bored, right?
Anyway, good night!

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Lita doesn't see me as an alien even though
I came here from another world. But what
is the difference between me and them?
Do the aliens have hearts, perhaps?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_030.text:
Well, she'll likely be covering the
election tomorrow, so I should go
and search for my heart.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_010.text:
I'm baaack! Oh, you're awake. I tried to
say something to you before I went to vote,
but you were in sleep mode for once.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_020.text:
Are ye covering the
polling place today?

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_040.text:
So ye will help to find my heart?
Oh, thank ye kindly.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_050.text:
Yep! That's why I decided to vote early.
Of course, if you're interested in the
polling place, I'm happy to go back.

SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_DIVA_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_060.text:
Anyway, today's news cycle is going
to be dominated by the election,
so let's hurry up and go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Electronic voting is pretty common outside
of Capitol City, but here, the old-fashioned
method of voting in person is alive and well. It's almost like a festival—or even
a ritual, I guess. Choosing a president
is just a really special time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
While I lack detailed data, I know this is
a nation of some size; to be elected its
president is a fine thing indeed.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh, it's not an exaggeration to say
the president wields total authority,
especially when it comes to times of
emergency and war. That's why... Huh? That's strange.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text: Is your intuition kicking in again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah. She looked like an election
official, but there's no reason for
her to be wandering around here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Hi there. Lita Caryx with the Post.
Care to tell me what's in the
box there? Because it looks
an awful lot like ballot paper.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Ack! I can't believe someone saw me!
But yeah, that's right: it's ballot paper.
What are you going to do about it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You don't have enough ballots there to even make
a dent in the totals for Capitol City, much less
the entire Union States. Which means you're
trying to pull something else.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I'm guessing you WANT me to report this in order
to reduce people's faith in the election—because
whoever comes out of a fraudulent election is
going to see their power greatly undermined.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
And the weaker the president is,
the easier it will be for aliens
to infiltrate your country.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You aliens thought I'd be so hungry for a scoop
that I'd fall for an obvious trick like this?
Boy, that really grinds my gears—I should
punch you right in your smug face!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
C'mon, just a little punch?
A love tap? Fine. Boo. No punching.
What a buzzkill you are.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Now get the heck out of my sight you
little alien puke, and don't come back!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Right then. Time to contact everyone
and make sure this doesn't turn into
some huge kerfuffle.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_1.text:
Will the election be completed
without further incident, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Well, there you have it: the one who
started with the upper hand pulled
out the victory in the end. Despite everything that happened,
Allen was just the stronger candidate.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
But now the election's over—and once the
inauguration coverage is done, I imagine
my work will calm down for a while. Sooo...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Say, what do you have on the
books tomorrow? Anything?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Well, I got a call from my contact at the
National Research Institute, and he wants
me to go to the Inspectorate tomorrow.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text: Why does he want us to go there?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
He's a little fuzzy on the details,
but apparently an ally at the
Inspectorate needs a favor from us.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
So ye have anti-alien group members there?
Your group is quite massive, it seems.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Oh, it's big all right—so big, in fact,
that I'm part of the group and don't
even know the entire scope of things. Anyway, sorry to drag you on another
errand, but let's head there tomorrow.
Good night.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Good morning, sunshine!
Let's get going.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I was told to come to the Inspectorate.
Should we just...wait here?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, wonderful! You dears both made it.
I'm the one who called you, but we
can't talk here. Please follow me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe YOU'RE
our ally here, Jessica!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
And I can't believe that fact evaded an
ace reporter like you! Hee hee hee! Well, I suppose I've been doing a good job—
which is good, because all of this wouldn't
have been possible otherwise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
But it's not you I have business
with, Lita. It's Diva.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
We want to dispatch the aliens in Capitol City
before the next president takes office—and to
do it, we need your help. Please consider this a formal request
from the President of the Union Nations,
Diva, and weigh it appropriately.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Will this have anything
to do with my heart?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm sorry, but I cannae do that.
I'm not qualified to take on the
responsibility of a whole nation.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, Lita? You're her friend.
What do you think?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, of course I want to see the aliens driven
out of the country. But as Diva's friend,
I understand what she means: this is a
problem for our country and our people.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I see. Well then, I suppose I've no choice
but to leave the decision in your hands.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I wonder if my heart can be
found beyond this elevator.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
You need permission to operate
this particular elevator, dear.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Should I take the fact you're proceeding
to mean you will accept the request I
made of you earlier?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I don't know, but I cannae simply abandon
people—especially if there's also a chance
of finding my own heart as well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: I believe you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Should we go together, love?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Of course! I need to see for myself
whether or not you finally get this
heart you're looking for.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Then let's go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
There's no security here...
What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Detecting multiple enemies with
a biological signal in the midst.
The president is over there!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I don't know who you are,
but don't come near me!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Please stay back, love.
I will rescue the president!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: STOP!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Stop! The enemy—

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Ach! They're reacting to our movements!
Mr. President, get down!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Th-they stopped...?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Aye, it's safe now; I accessed their
network and initiated a forced shutdown.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
You live up to your reputation, Diva.
And despite the current situation,
I welcome you to the Office of the
President of the Union States. I take this to mean you
have accepted my request?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
My, my! Having you AND the president here
together certainly does save me some trouble—
for you both serve as obstacles to our
cooperation with the next president!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Get back, Mr. President!
I'll handle this!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Such arrogance! You'll soon realize we have
only been toying with you until now!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
And with that, I believe you've dealt with all
the aliens in the vicinity. I shudder to think
of what might have happened had you not arrived
when you did. Now all that remains is to capture the
remaining aliens before the transfer of power
to the next administration.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
What's the nature of your relationship
with the aliens, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Eight years ago, shortly after I took
office, we learned of the existence
of the aliens. We knew we had to control the narrative of
such an explosive story, so we contacted them
and began a series of discreet dealings. Over time, I forged a policy in which
I sometimes accept their various demands,
but ultimately minimize their influence.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
And they dinnae wish for that
arrangement to continue.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Evidently not. Their demands have escalated
recently, up to and including things that
pose a threat to the very independence
of the Union States. We also received credible intelligence that
they were in contact with a presidential
candidate, at which point we had no choice
but to act.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
The existence of the anti-alien organization—
as well as you, Diva—pushed us to make the
decision we did.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Don't you think the fact you've kept
this from the public for eight years
is problematic, Mr. President?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: That's a question you would have as a reporter, yes? But what is your opinion as a member of the anti-alien organization? Do you truly think we should leave the question of how to deal with aliens up to the wider public?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, judging by how the aliens
have been conducting themselves...
No. No, we probably shouldn't.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
We arrived at the same conclusion.
We kept the aliens a secret in order
to protect the Union States, but also
because the aliens themselves wished it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Thanks to you all, the secret has been kept.
And I would ask that you continue to keep
all that has occurred here in the strictest
of confidences.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Now then, Diva, I hear you came here
in search of a heart. Were you able
to find what you needed?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Nae, I still don't even know what my
heart IS, let alone where I might be
finding it. I thought I might come
across some kind of lead here, though.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I see. Well, such matters are often things
one must look for and discover on their own,
so please feel free to search at your leisure.
And as for you, Lita?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Are you kidding me? I'm gonna stick around
and see if this magic heart gets found!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_B_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_HUM_B_000_C.text:
I can't believe Bailey came from behind
and pulled it out! People are going to
be talking about this election for years.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Greetings. I am the President of the
Union States. Welcome to my office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe the president
was actually an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text: Who are you?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text: Jinks! Another president!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text: Wait, Diva.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Jessica sent us here
to help, Mr. President.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, so she did. I take this to mean you
have dispatched the impersonator?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
We have, Mr. President—and I'm
glad we could be of assistance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I first learned of the aliens eight years
ago when I took over from my predecessor. I'd found some of his policy decisions to be
strange, but in that instant, the mystery
was solved: the Union States' government
was being subjected to alien interference.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Throughout my eight years in office, I've
worked to weaken their influence, ignoring
the meager scraps they tried to toss our way.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text: And the aliens dinnae like that?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
No, they did not. In fact, they found me so
difficult to deal with that they attempted
to interfere with the last election—but I was
re-elected anyway with the public's support.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Which brings us to the current election.
Knowing my successor would have trouble
dealing with the aliens, my administration
devised a plan to wipe them out. Sadly, they got the jump on me,
which was an inexcusable blunder
on my part as commander-in-chief.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
But thanks to all of your brave efforts,
we've managed to recover our position.
Now all that remains is to track down
the remaining aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
But what if more aliens come?
I mean, you won't be president forever.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
After I leave office, I plan to lead the anti-
alien organization. If there is another secret
invasion, I will reveal their existence and call
upon the Union States to stand against them.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Gotta say, it feels really good
to have a hero of the Channel War
leading our organization.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I'd like to offer special thanks to you, Diva.
If you have not yet found the heart you were
searching for, simply let me know and I will
offer whatever aid I can.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Nae, I haven't found it yet. I don't even
know what my heart IS, let alone where
I might be finding it. I thought I might come
across some kind of lead here, though.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
We humans place great importance on hearts,
and yet are often quick to abandon them.
I pray you are able to find your own.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, I'm definitely gonna stick around
and see if this magic heart gets found.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Well, there you have it: the one who started
out with the upper hand pulled out the win.
Despite everything that happened, Allen was
just the stronger candidate in the end.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
I suppose this will make your life
a bit calmer now, love?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'll have plenty of events to cover
until the inauguration, but things won't
be anywhere near as nuts as they were
during the election.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Then perhaps ye might be willing to help
search for my heart? Because I don't know
how to even begin getting on with that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Happy to help. Also, I know I said I'd follow you
wherever, but it turns out you mostly ended
up following ME around on various stories—
real sorry about that. Anyway, good night.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Diva, it's an emergency! You have to come
with me to the laboratory right now!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text: Oh my days! Was there an accident!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Intermittent distortions have been observed
at the Office of the President. We've never
seen anything quite like this before.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text: Yes—and we should expect the worst.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm a bit surprised we're the only
ones here during an emergency.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
That's because the police would laugh me out
of the room if I called them and said 'something
happened on the presidential grounds.'

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Then we've no choice
but to go ourselves.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
But we need permission to use the elevator
to the presidential office, and making
a formal application takes forever!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Then we'll just force our way in. Here,
I hacked this ID to have full elevator
privileges, and you're welcome to use it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Desperate times and all. But remember, 
going all the way to the top is a surefire
way to get caught.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Being caught means nothing compared
to what'll happen if we fail.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
Are you sure about this, Diva?
You know you don't have to come.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
I've no other option; I cannae place
ye or Dr. Nishant in danger.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
Well, when you put it that way, thanks.
Honestly, I'll probably get killed six ways
from Sunday if I go up there alone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.text:
This is the source of the distortion.
I'll search for the president.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.text: Mr. President! Are you all right?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
We've come to help ye, Mr. President.
Thankfully, ye seem unharmed.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
So you're members of the anti-alien
organization—which I suppose would make
you Diva. Thank you for saving me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
My administration is aware of the beings
you call aliens, and we have been keeping
a careful watch on their activities. That said, I never expected they might
mount such a bold attack so soon after
the presidential election.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
What did the aliens from before
hope to achieve by replacing ye?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
They must have been crazy to think they could
deceive our people with that thing, and yet it's
all a bit much for a practical joke.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Do you think they'll try
something like this again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
I suspect the answer to that is yes,
although we'll attempt to use more
proactive measures moving forward. We'll need to hand power over to the
next administration, and I'm sure we'll
need your organization's help as well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Now then, Diva, I hear you came here
in search of a heart. Were you able
to find what you needed?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Nae, I still don't even know what my
heart IS, let alone where I might be
finding it. Ye wouldn't happen to
know anything about it, would ye?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Sadly, one cannot simply will themselves to 
find their own heart. But we all have something
inside of us, even if we can't see it—and I
believe that something is our heart.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text: Yet I've no such thing inside me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
I'm afraid that's all I can say—
but I wish you the best of luck.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MON_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_MON_000_CUT.text:
Bailey really turned things around for himself.
He's going to be a different kind of president
than what we've had before, and I'm looking
forward to what happens in the future.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
There's no security here?
What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
Oh, there's someone inside.
Let's check it out.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
Okay, what the heck?
TWO presidents?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
One is the real president, and the other
an alien—though the level of concordance
produced by comparing their data values
is proper mad!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
The president's staff look just
as confused as we are.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text: Then I've no choice but to do THIS!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I've succeeded in distinguishing
between the alien and the president.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
Are you CRAZY!? What was your
plan if you got the wrong one?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
A fair question—and yet, I love
the conviction you acted with!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
So you're members of the anti-alien
organization—which I suppose would make
you Diva. Thank you for saving me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
What did the aliens from before
hope to achieve by replacing ye?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
Nae, I still don't even know what my
heart IS, let alone where I might be
finding it. I thought I might come
across some kind of lead here, though.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I see. Well, such matters are often things
one must look for and discover on their own,
so please feel free to search at your leisure.
And as for you, Lita?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
Are you kidding me? I'm gonna stick around
and see if this magic heart gets found!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
And so your next president is decided.
That was more than a wee bit exciting!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Oh, don't get the idea that's how all our
elections go; this one was particularly
eventful. But hey, now I get to cover the
events leading up to the inauguration!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Ye seem very busy, love, but I still
have to go search for my heart.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
I'm happy to help, if you want; it's not
like I'll need to be gathering stories
every minute of every day, after all.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Oh, that would be grand! Your information
network is certainly broader than what
I have access to, after all.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Need something found, ask a crack reporter!
Now get that sleep mode activated,
because we've got a busy day tomorrow.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text: All right, let's get ready to go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Well, howdy there, partners! We're with
the marshal's office, and we're gonna
need this cutie here to come with us.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Can't answer that one, hon.
Now shake your spurs.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Wait! If you're taking her, I'm coming.
I'm in the middle of covering her for an
in-depth story.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text: Sorry, darlin', but she goes alone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Well, ain't you just a peach!
But fine. You want your gal along,
we'll go ahead and let 'er come.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.text:
So we're going to the
Office of the President?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.text:
We sure are, hon—and you've been
given official permission to tag along!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: Go right in here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: Let's go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Welcome to the Office of the President.
You must be Diva and Shungiku Hanabusa.
Ah, but you prefer Lita, yes? As you probably know, I am the
President of the Union States.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I called you here today so we could
speak about the beings you call aliens.
Put simply, they do not exist.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
What? No! But we've seen them!
And we have hard observational data!

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
All of which are products
of government experiments.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: So that means?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Just as you created an anti-alien organization
to carry out your activities, the government
has also been conducting various experiments in
preparation for interference from other worlds. An example of this is the unique
'other dimension' you have experienced.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
You, Diva, have a higher than normal chance
to enter such special spaces—and I believe
you are well aware of the reason.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Your appearance here brought our experiments
to the next phase. It proved that interference
from the outside is a real possibility.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
These experiments will now be inherited
by the next administration—and it's all
thanks to you, Diva.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Okay, hang on! What about our organization!?
We've been working like dogs to protect this
country and its people, and it was all...
What? A waste!? A fantasy!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Sadly, Lita, I need you to bear an even
heavier burden: you must never let your
organization know the truth. I would have you carry out your activities
just as before—which is why you must
forget all that you learned here today.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
You may regret coming along with
Diva, but doing so was a choice
made by you alone. If you wish my advice, I would suggest you
leave the organization entirely. I believe
you could live more easily that way.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Some of your members, such as
Dr. Nishant, will be recruited to
other government organizations.
But as for you...

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I understand, Mr. President. I'm a citizen
of the Union States, and I have pledged my
allegiance to the flag. I will do my duty. BUT! In exchange, I want an exclusive,
all-access, nothing-off-the-record
interview the day you leave office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I agree to your terms—and in truth,
I rather expected this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Hope you don't regret this, Mr. President!
'Cause after eight years in office, I have a
boatload of questions for you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Now, Diva, I would ask you to pack up and
leave the Union States at once. We intend
to purge all trace of your existence; not even
the next administration will know of you. The eventual appearance of aliens will prove
a great trouble without further experiments—
and with your knowledge of the world beyond,
you would be a cancer for our nation's future.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Me being here WOULD be troublesome,
wouldn't it? Very well, I'll be off.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: Thank you for understanding.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text: Ugh. How careless for a world to choose its leaders through a popular vote. Come now, let's move on.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
So you're leaving us?
And uh...through a manhole?

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
Aye, it looks like a manhole, but it's
actually a gate to another world.
But it wouldn't take ye there even
if ye were to pass through it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text: You're probably right about that, but I'm still curious how the thing works. I mean, not curious enough to actually jump into a manhole, but you know.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ye say that, but I hope ye don't attempt
anything reckless; ye cannae let that
bold reporter spirit get the best of ye! Nonetheless, ye've been a great help
to me, love, so cheers for that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text: I know our time together was short, but it was also really fun.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
Wow. She's really gone. Thought she might
open the manhole cover and leave, but nope.
She's just...gone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_DIVA_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you didn't seem like any old robot
to me, Diva; I know you've got a heart
in there somewhere...
